channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: RenXchange is Hiring!
item.description: Do you want to make a difference for RPI? Do you want to gain skills in fundraising, communication, and customer service? You’re in luck! RenXchange is hiring! Benefits include: convenient location at the DCC, competitive pay, a fun environment with other students, and flex scheduling. Spaces are limited – apply at https://app.smartsheet.com/b/form/5620f155c9d94a76977dc3806bb3584c. For more information contact Uzi…
item.author: Students

item.title: Fall 2025 Student Course Evaluations Now Open
item.description: Date: Tuesday, November 25, 2025 (all day) - Fall 2025 course evaluations are now open. The evaluation period will be open from November 25th through December 11th. Your feedback is very important to the Institute, the five schools, and their departments, so please complete evaluation surveys for all your courses! Evaluations will be available through Thursday, December 11th, 2025.
item.author: Students

item.title: Do you want to Inspire the next generation of Engineers?
item.description: Attention, Freshmen and Sophomores! Applications are now open for the Engineering Ambassadors! This group has a passion for K-12 Educational Outreach and works with local schools to promote STEM exploration, making engineering more accessible to a younger audience. Please visit the link to our application. Applications close at midnight on January 23, 2026. Contact Recruitment Coordinator, Katie Titus with questions.
item.author: Students

item.title: RPI Study Day | Dec. 15
item.description: Date: Monday, December 15, 2025 9:00 AM - 10:00 PM - Join us for our Annual Study Day, a dedicated learning environment designed to support you during finals preparation. This all-day event provides structured study time, peer tutoring, review sessions with mental floss activities and our signature Puck cookie!
item.author: Students

item.title: Finals Week Dining Halls Updated Hours
item.description: To better support students during finals, Commons and Russell Sage Dining Halls will open for breakfast 30 minutes earlier during finals. Please click the link to see the announcement and to find out hours of operations for these dining halls. Good luck on your exams!
item.author: Students

item.title: Fuel Up for Finals with Brain Food Week!
item.description:
Get ready to power through finals—Brain Food Week is coming December 15–19! Stop by Commons’ Bliss station and locations throughout Father’s to find Mindful, brain-boosting snacks designed to help you stay sharp, energized, and focused.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Students
